Sections.SectionText: What's going on? I was just attacked by a microwave!
Something's gone wrong with the tech. Not just at HQ, but throughout the city. Over.
I hope it's not aliens again. Or Chthulu.
Whatever it is, we've triangulated the source of the problem at the National Aquarium. Over.
Get to the rooftop. We're sending in a helicopter to airlift you to the drop point. Over.
Wait, was I supposed to have been saying "Over" this whole time?
Get to the rooftop. We're sending in a helicopter to airlift you to the drop point. Over.
